title: Test bd comment size limits
description: Throwaway task to test large comment handling

title: Fix inter-agent data flow and bd handling issues
description:
Review identified 2 critical, 4 major, and 3 minor issues in workflow agents.

## Critical
1. Planner Input section lists file path as primary but Phase 1 says bd is primary - inconsistent
2. Master describes what task IDs to pass but not HOW to pass them to agents

## Major
1. Inconsistent fallback behavior - Input sections contradict Phase 1 instructions across agents
2. Analyst uses [own-task-id] for comments but [issue-id] for closing - unclear distinction
3. No agent shows bd commit command - unclear if auto-commit or missing
4. Master validation doesn't specify what constitutes valid output in bd comments

## Minor
1. Implementer bd comment is optional but master expects to validate output exists
2. Inconsistent variable naming: [issue-id] vs [own-task-id] vs [task-id]
3. Reviewer Phase 1 mixes comment-in-code-block format

## Recommendations
1. Add explicit handoff protocol to master.md with invocation syntax
2. Standardize variable naming across all agents
3. Update Input sections to match Phase 1 behavior
4. Clarify implementer output expectations
5. Document bd commit semantics
close_reason: Fixed all 6 issues: bd show→bd comments, standardized Input sections, added invocation syntax, unified [task-id] naming, fixed reviewer formatting, added validation criteria

title: Implementer does not create/checkout planned branch
description:
Facts from this run:

1. Plan specified branch: feature/hriste-4j5-cancancan-modular-authorization (line 16 of plan)
2. Actual branch used: feature/manufacture-domain (the branch that was already checked out at session start)
3. No new branch was created: The implementer sub-agent committed directly to the existing branch without creating or checking out the planned branch
4. Commits made:
   - 1d8159ee feat: implement modular CanCanCan authorization with financial_controller role (implementer)
   - caa68755 fix: Register user_role_selector Stimulus controller (review) (reviewer)

Gap: The implementer agent did not follow the branch name from the plan. It worked on whatever branch was current when the task started. The planner wrote a branch name but there was no handoff mechanism to ensure the implementer actually created/used it.

title: For Human Teams
description: 1. **Evaluate outcomes, not effort** — did the feature work, not how many hours

title: test throwaway task for comment testing
Anti-Gaming Principles
description: | Principle | Why It Works |

title: Remove duplicate Postgres configuration
description: Both init container and postgres-sidecar define identical Postgres config. Redundant and confusing. Solution: Keep only sidecar configuration.

title: Transform claude-sandbox to global command with auto-detection
description: Transform claude-sandbox to global command with auto-detection

title: Add database readiness check to entrypoint.sh
description: entrypoint.sh runs Rails db commands immediately without waiting for Postgres sidecar to be ready. In k8s, there's no depends_on health checks like docker-compose. Solution: Add pg_isready wait loop before database operations.

title: Fix inter-stage data passing in development workflow
description: Passing data between workflow stages via files consistently fails. Redesign the inter-stage communication mechanism. User proposes using bd task comments/descriptions to store stage outputs. Need analysis of alternatives.
close_reason: All 4 stages complete. File-based handoffs replaced with bd comments. Critical fix: added Bash tool to analyst and planner toolsets.

title: Analyze inter-stage communication problem and propose solutions
close_reason: Analysis complete. Root cause: planner lacks Write tool; file-based handoff is structurally broken. Recommended: master-as-relay using Task tool return values.

title: Plan implementation of chosen approach
close_reason: Plan complete. Approach A: bd comments as inter-stage transport. Planner needs Bash tool added. Master needs ID-passing logic.

title: Remove broken init container pattern from k8s job template
description: Init container tries to background Postgres then exits, killing the backgrounded process. Creates race condition where main container starts before sidecars are ready. Solution: Remove init container entirely, rely on sidecars only.
close_reason: Removed broken init container pattern from k8s/job-template.yaml. The init container attempted to background Postgres then exit, which killed the backgrounded process. Now relying solely on postgres-sidecar which runs properly alongside the main container.

title: Fix inter-agent data flow: bd comments, Input sections, variable naming
description: 6 specific fixes across agent files: 1) bd show→bd comments for reading upstream output, 2) Standardize Input sections for bd-primary, 3) Add invocation syntax to master.md, 4) Standardize [task-id] naming, 5) Fix reviewer Phase 1 formatting, 6) Clarify output validation

title: Automate Docker image build and push via CI on release-it tags
description: Set up CI/CD pipeline to automatically build and push Docker image when release-it creates a semantic versioned tag. Should integrate with existing release-it workflow and only trigger on tag creation.

title: Plan implementation
description: Analyze codebase for existing CI/CD setup, release-it configuration, and Docker setup. Design GitHub Actions workflow that triggers on tag push from release-it.

title: Implement CI/CD pipeline
description: Create GitHub Actions workflow file, update release-it config if needed, and ensure Docker build/push happens only on semver tags.

title: Review implementation
description: Review CI/CD workflow for correctness, security best practices, and proper integration with release-it.

title: Claude in sandbox doesn't resolve beads task IDs
description: When running 'claude-sandbox local "/develop .claude-muf"', the sandboxed Claude Code session fails to recognize that '.claude-muf' refers to a beads task. Instead of looking up the task with 'bd show .claude-muf', Claude treats it as a file path and looks for a literal file named '.claude-muf' in the workspace.

title: The Core Tension
description: You're trying to optimize for **quality × speed** while preventing **Goodhart's Law** (when a measure becomes a target, it ceases to be a good measure).

title: Provenance Tracking
description: When reviewing, note which upstream agent's work:

title: Track severity counts and category classification over time
description: Track counts of severities in reviews over time. Also do basic classification of the problem matter (testing, ui, ...). Desired output - track number of issues in each triage category over time. Use json. Save in directory that does not invoke Claude permission request each session.

title: Analyze and specify severity tracking requirements
Improve CLAUDE_IMAGE default in k8s template
description: Template uses placeholder 'your-registry/claude-sandbox:latest' which will fail. Solution: Add better documentation or fail-fast validation in bin/claude-sandbox remote command.

title: For AI Agents Specifically
description: AI agents don't have intrinsic motivation — "incentives" means **selection pressure** and **prompt design**.

title: Move lessons-learned.md to artifacts directory
description: Update workflow to read/write lessons-learned.md in artifacts/lessons-learned.md. Currently it's in .claude/ and Claude is asking to edit each session.

title: Create user database schema and migrations
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing user credentials, sessions, and profile data. Include migrations for creating tables.

title: Implement authentication API endpoints
description: Build REST API endpoints for login, logout, register, password reset, and session validation. Includes JWT token handling.

title: Build login/logout UI components
description: Create React components for login form, registration form, password reset flow, and user session management in the frontend.

title: Fix hardcoded database name in k8s template
description: k8s job-template.yaml hardcodes 'hriste_development' while docker-compose uses configurable DATABASE_NAME. Makes system less portable. Solution: Use environment variable from secrets for database name.

title: Add Redis readiness check to entrypoint.sh
description: Similar to Postgres, Redis sidecar may not be ready when entrypoint.sh runs. Solution: Add redis-cli ping wait loop before any Redis operations.

title: Mock: Add greeting message to CLI
description: Add a --greet flag to the CLI that prints 'Hello, world\!'
close_reason: Mock test complete. bd comments transport verified.

title: Improve log management for parallel k8s deployments
description:
When running multiple claude-sandbox jobs in parallel, it's hard to track which logs belong to which job.

Current: bin/claude-sandbox logs shows most recent job only

Improvement: Add labels to job template for better filtering:
- repo: extracted from REPO_URL
- branch: from REPO_BRANCH
- task-type: optional classification

Then update bin/claude-sandbox logs to:
- List all running jobs with labels
- Allow filtering: bin/claude-sandbox logs --repo=hriste --branch=main
- Show job metadata in output

Files to modify:
- bin/claude-sandbox (cmd_remote to add labels, cmd_logs to support filtering)
- k8s/job-template.yaml (add label fields)

Related to parallel deployments support.

title: Implement multi-Ruby version support via image tagging
description: Support multiple Ruby versions through tagged Docker images instead of static build-time version. Auto-detect from .ruby-version and select appropriate image.
close_reason: Multi-Ruby version support successfully implemented and pushed
